name: parakeet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of many types of small parrot with a long tail: Before I got my first pet parakeet, I had no idea you could bond with a bird. Mockingbirds, doves and parakeets fly under a canopy of cypresses and cedars.
Devonyu/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI have a wife, two kids, two dogs, two parakeets and four lizards.The Carolina parrot is known today as the Carolina parakeet.Caged parakeets and cockatiels chirp in a back yard filled with herbs and orchids.
